value.title: Hosted By
value.description:
About Event

​After a full day of conversations, come enjoy an event that’s all about good people and good drinks.
Pilot, Paul Hastings, OneDigital and Mercury are hosting a Life Sciences Happy Hour for founders who want to relax, recharge, and raise a glass with fellow builders.

​Expect: great drinks, great vibes, and great company.
Not expected: slide decks, pitches, or the word “synergy.”

​If you’re a Life Sciences founder in town for JPMCH Conference, this is the place to be.

​January 13
